shortdesc.p: Welcome to breakfast at Marjan's! Today I have left a set of recipes for you to follow, so that your experience this weekend is that much more easy and relaxing. The following recipes will provide you with an energetic start to your day that will leave you satisfied until lunch! After you have enjoyed your breakfasts, a clean-up guide can be found to help with the little or big messes you may have made in your breakfast adventures. A troubleshooting and reference guide have been included for your convenience.

This colorful and flavorful hash is sure to provide everyone with an array of flavors and tastes to satisfy any morning hunger. Ingredients are easily interchangeable, making this recipe fun and dynamic.
